alert.note: Alert for McIntosh; Pittsburg (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 23 at 8:46PM CDT until September 23 at 9:30PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tulsa has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern McIntosh County in southeastern Oklahoma... North central Pittsburg County in southeastern Oklahoma... * Until 930 PM CDT. * At 845 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 3 miles north of Hanna, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations in or near the path include... Eufaula... Crowder... Canadian... Indianola... Hanna... Stidham... Arrowhead State Park... Raiford... Vivian... Vernon... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
